long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,:
A Crypto Wallet for Amino Chain and Ethereum

It is an extension for accessing Ethereum enabled distributed applications, or "Dapps" in your browser!

The extension injects the Ethereum web3 API into every website's javascript context, so that dapps can read from the blockchain.

Alpha Carbon Wallet also lets the user create and manage their own identities (via private keys, local client wallet and hardware wallets), so when a Dapp wants to perform a transaction and write to the blockchain, the user gets a secure interface to review the transaction, before approving or rejecting it.

Because it adds functionality to the normal browser context, Alpha Carbon Wallet requires the permission to read and write to any webpage. You can always "view the source" of Alpha Carbon Wallet the way you do any Chrome extension, or view the source code on Github:
https://github.com/Alpha-Carbon/wallet-extension

Enables access to:
Web 3.0
Dapps
NFTs
erc20
tokens
ICOs
erc271
...and more!
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US:
Carbon Wallet is an extension for accessing Dapps in your browser!

The extension injects the Ethereum web3 API into every website's javascript context, so that Dapps can read from the blockchain.

Carbon Wallet also lets the user create and manage their own identities (via private keys, local client wallet and hardware wallets), so when a Dapp wants to perform a transaction and write to the blockchain, the user gets a secure interface to review the transaction, before approving or rejecting it.

Because it adds functionality to the normal browser context, Carbon Wallet requires the permission to read and write to any webpage. You can always "view the source" of Carbon Wallet the way you do any Chrome extension, or view the source code on Github:
https://github.com/Alpha-Carbon/wallet-extension

Enables access to:
Web 3.0
Dapps
NFTs
erc20
tokens
ICOs
erc271
...and more!
